title: Lvl-6 Enchant

properties.name: description
properties.value: Lvl-6 Enchant is a utility spell in the standard spellbook, requiring level 87 Magic to cast. The spell enchants onyx jewellery, granting 97 Magic experience when doing so.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Lvl-6 Enchant
This article is about the spell. For the magic tablet, see Enchant onyx.
Lvl-6 Enchant
Released 4 October 2005 (Update)
Members Yes
Level 87
Spellbook Standard
Type Utility
Experience 97
Runes 20 20 1
Casting speed 3 ticks (7 on autocast)
Description For use on onyx jewellery
Animation
Sound Effect

Lvl-6 Enchant is a utility spell in the standard spellbook, requiring level 87 Magic to cast. The spell enchants onyx jewellery, granting 97 Magic experience when doing so.

This spell can be transferred to a magic tablet by bringing the required runes and a piece of soft clay to a lectern in the study of a player-owned house, granting the same experience as casting the spell.

Onyx necklace 1,642,897 Berserker necklace 1,908,168 265,177
Onyx bracelet 1,691,472 Regen bracelet 1,929,354 237,788
Onyx amulet 1,829,197 Amulet of fury 1,931,069 101,778
  1. ↑ Includes spell costs; column assumes an appropriate rune-providing item is used.
